attributes.action: carry out a refererendum of the people to decide whether or not he should be charged with war crimes offences, by the people he claims to have represented when going to war in Iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only way we might come close to getting to the truth about the invasion of Iraq is to put Bliar on trial for crimes against humanity, along with Hoon, Goldsmith and Gordon Brown, in an international courtroom, outside the control of this government, which has the power to demand attendance by anybody from anywhere on the planet.  The only way Bliar is going to be put on trial is if the overwhelming majority of the population of this country make it clear that is what they want to happen, by signing this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
